com.attributestudios.minecraft.installer.updates

Class Update

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.attributestudios.minecraft.installer.updates.Update
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Update
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Models an update class that can be read from an XML file.
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Bridger Maskrey (maskreybe@live.com)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
    Date:
    2014-08-19

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.text.DateFormat dateFormat
      DateFormat object to be used to build a date from the updated date.
      private static long serialVersionUID
      The version UID for the Update object.
      private java.lang.String updateDate
      A string representation of the update date, formatted in the style of "yyyy-MM-dd".
      private java.util.List<UpdateFile> updatedFiles
      A list of all files that should be updated.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Update()
      Creates a new Update object and initializes the update date and the updated file list.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getUpdateDate()
      Gets the date that this update was published on.
      java.util.List<UpdateFile> getUpdatedFiles()
      Gets a reference to the list of files to include in the update.
      static Update readFromXML(java.io.File xmlFile)
      Reads a new Update form an extant XML file.
      void setUpdateDate(java.lang.String updateDate)
      Sets the update date to a new update date.
      void setUpdatedFiles(java.util.List<UpdateFile> updatedFiles)
      Sets the list of updated files to a new list of updated files.
      void writeToXML()
      Writes the update to a new XML file with a name equivalent to "update_" + the update date.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getUpdateDate

        public java.lang.String getUpdateDate()
        Gets the date that this update was published on.
        Returns:
        The update date of the update.

      • setUpdateDate

        public void setUpdateDate(java.lang.String updateDate)
        Sets the update date to a new update date.
        Parameters:
        updateDate - The new date-formatted String to set as the update date.

      • getUpdatedFiles

        public java.util.List<UpdateFile> getUpdatedFiles()
        Gets a reference to the list of files to include in the update.
        Returns:
        A reference to the file update list, which can be edited

      • setUpdatedFiles

        public void setUpdatedFiles(java.util.List<UpdateFile> updatedFiles)
        Sets the list of updated files to a new list of updated files.
        Parameters:
        updatedFiles - The new list of updated files to set as the list of updated files.

      • writeToXML

        public void writeToXML()
                throws java.io.IOException
        Writes the update to a new XML file with a name equivalent to "update_" + the update date.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown when the XML file fails to be written to the disk.

      • readFromXML

        public static Update readFromXML(java.io.File xmlFile)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Reads a new Update form an extant XML file.
        Parameters:
        xmlFile - The file from which to read the new Update.
        Returns:
        A new Update file as read from the XML file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown when the XML file fails to be read correctly.
